summary: 18 Greatest Sand Sculptures Ever Made. It would seem that the sky’s the limit as far as bizarre Angry Birds merchandise is concerned, while a galaxy far, far away has motivated clever street artists to produce awesome Star Wars graffiti
content:
Photo: Harrihealey02
A brilliantly mixed bag of goodies this week! Like heights? Well be inspired by the world’s 10 tallest hospitals. And speaking of healthcare, 12 lucky animals have been given a new lease of life with unbelievable technology; check them out!
It would seem that the sky’s the limit as far as bizarre Angry Birds merchandise is concerned, while a galaxy far, far away has motivated clever street artists to produce awesome Star Wars graffiti. Oh, and don’t miss amazing sculptures created using sand and balloons, deserted shopping malls that have seen better days, and NFL players still going strong after their 40th birthdays!
10 Tallest Hospitals in the World
The Greatest Star Wars Graffiti & Street Art Collection Ever
15 Brilliantly Featherbrained Pieces of Angry Birds Merchandise
8 Quirky Houses Around the World
12 Brilliant Bionic Animals
10 Incredibly Desolate Dead Shopping Malls
13 Balloon Sculptures That Let Your Imagination Float Away
10 of the Oldest Players in NFL History
18 Greatest Sand Sculptures Ever Made
Chayote Squash
author: Alice Lipscombe-Southwell
title: 10 Coolest Links of the Week
